Welcome to the rules for Chalice!

This game plays just like Hearts, but the Suits were swapped for traditional Tarot card suits.

 Hearts			 ---> Cups
 Spades		 ---> Swords
 Clubs			 ---> Coins
 Diamonds ---> Wands

Scoring:
Points are accrued by either picking up a card with a suit of Hearts, or picking up the Queen of Swords. Each Heart is worth ONE point, while the Queen of Swords is worth 13 points. When a player takes all 26 points in a round, they "Shoot the Moon" which means all other players get 26 points added to their score, and the player who shot the moon gets none. 

Whichever player has the lowest score wins and games go on until a player hits either 50 or 100 points​ (chosen by user). Chalice is played in hands which are played in tricks of four cards each​. Tricks are won based whichever card has the highest value of the first suit lead.
